title: Hire inputs if VMP exceeds price

content.question: A perfectly competitive profit-maximizing firm will continue to hire additional units of an input as long as the

choices.label: marginal product of the input is maximized
marginal cost of employing the input is maximized
value of the marginal product of the input exceeds the price of the input
revenue associated with the employment of the last unit of the input is maximized
price of the product is greater than the marginal cost of the input

content.answer: value of the marginal product of the input exceeds the price of the input

topic.text: 5.3: Profit-Maximizing Behavior in Perfectly Competitive Factor Markets
